Section.name: About AIMT
Section.description:
Ambalika Institute of Management and Technology (AIMT) is a private institute established in the year 2008 in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh. The institute is affiliated with Lucknow University, Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University and BTE. AIMT Lucknow is approved by AICTE and accredited by NAAC. It offers UG, PG, Diploma and PG Diploma courses in the fields of Engineering, Technology, Management, Business Administration, etc.
AIMT Lucknow has more than 3000 students and 190+ faculty members. The campus area is spread over an area of 200 acres. The institute offers placement opportunities to students. A total of 73 students from CSE and 10 students from MBA got placed during the recent placement drive. AIMT Lucknow’s top recruiters are TCS, Topper, Morgan Stanley, Wipro, Spark Minda, etc.
Check More: AIMT Lucknow Admission 2024

AIMT Lucknow offers financial assistance to students in the following forms:
AIMT Lucknow students can avail of the Bihar Student Credit Card Yojana. The students who have passed Intermediate/ Class XII from the institution that falls under the Government of Bihar are eligible to apply for this yojana. This scheme aims to provide financial assistance to economically deprived candidates. The steps are given below to apply for AIMT Lucknow admission through this scheme:

AIMT Lucknow has more than 190 faculty members who are highly experienced and qualified in their domains. They guide students in their career paths and solve their queries.
Ques. What is the full form of AIMT Lucknow?
Ans. AIMT refers to the Ambalika Institute of Management and Technology located in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh.
Ques. Is AIMT Lucknow a private or government institute?
Ans. AIMT Lucknow is a private institute established in 2008.
Ques. Which university is AIMT Lucknow affiliated with?
Ans. AIMT Lucknow is affiliated with Lucknow University, Dr APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University and the Board of Technical Education (BTE).
Ques. What courses are offered by AIMT Lucknow?
Ans. AIMT Lucknow offers UG, PG, Diploma and PG Diploma courses in the fields of Engineering, Technology, Management, Business Administration, etc.
Ques. What is the B.Tech CSE fee in AIMT Lucknow?
Ans. AIMT Lucknow B.Tech CSE total fee is INR 422,809.
Ques. How are the placements at AIMT Lucknow?
Ans. AIMT Lucknow offers good placement opportunities to students. A total of 73 students from CSE and 10 students from MBA got placed during the recent placement drive. AIMT Lucknow’s top recruiters are TCS, Topper, Morgan Stanley, Wipro, Spark Minda, etc. The highest package closed at INR 20 LPA for the year 2023.
Ques. Does AIMT Lucknow offer MBA?
Ans. AIMT Lucknow offers MBA under three specializations which are Marketing, Finance and Human Resource Management. The per year MBA fee is INR 211,949. The minimum eligibility to apply for the AIMT Lucknow MBA is that a candidate must have passed graduation in a relevant field from a recognized university.
Ques. Does AIMT Lucknow provide scholarships?
Ans. AIMT Lucknow offers financial assistance to students in the form of the Bihar Student Credit Card Yojana and Samaj Kalyan Vibhag scholarship.
Ques. What is special about AIMT Lucknow?
Ans. Ambalika Institute of Management & Technology is the first institute in Lucknow to have its B.Tech CSE and Mechanical programs accredited by the NBA.
Ques. What is the campus area of AIMT Lucknow?
Ans. AIMT Lucknow campus area is spread over an area of 200 acres.

AIMT Lucknow Highlights.Highlights: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University, Lucknow University and BTE
UG, PG, Diploma & PG Diploma Programs
University innovation fellows,Tie up with microsoft and siemens for professional training, Tie up with mendel university, czech republic for student exchange program
KUKA, Rapid Prototyping, ITS PLC, ACE Micromatic, Microsoft, MLAB, Siemens, Mastercam X9

AIMT Lucknow Courses.Details:
Duration: 4 Years
Specializations: Computer Science, Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering, Biotechnology Engineering, Information Technology, Computer Science Engineering (AI & ML)
AIMT Lucknow Courses.Eligibility Criteria: Passed the qualifying exam with minimum 45% marks (40% marks for SC/ST Category) in aggregate in three subjects. Also, qualifying exam should be passed without grace
The candidate must have scored 50% aggregate marks (for General and OBC) or 45% aggregate marks (for SC/ ST) in the qualifying exam based on total marks of all subjects
Passed Class 12 with 50% marks (45% for reserved categories) with Mathematics/Computer as one of the main subjects

Intermediate or equivalent examination with commerce stream or Intermediate with economics or mathematics as one of the subjects of study. General & OBC candidates must score 40% marks (33% for SC/ST) in the qualifying exam. BA LLB – 12th or equivalent exam passed from any recognized board.

AIMT Lucknow Courses.Details:
Duration: 2 Years
Specializations: Industrial Automation and Robotics, CAD & CAM
AIMT Lucknow Courses.Eligibility Criteria: Passed B.E./B.Tech from a recognized university

AIMT Lucknow Courses.Details:
Duration: 2 Years
Specializations: Marketing, Finance, Human Resources
AIMT Lucknow Courses.Eligibility Criteria: Passed bachelor's degree in any stream from a recognised institute/ university with a minimum of 50% aggregate (45% for SC/ ST candidates)

AIMT Lucknow Courses.Details:
Duration: 2 Years
Specializations: Electronics Engineering, Mechanical Production Engineering, Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Mechanical Automobile Engineering
AIMT Lucknow Courses.Eligibility Criteria: Passed 10th from any Recognized Board with a minimum 35% marks

AIMT Lucknow Courses.Details: Specializations: Accountancy, Mass Comm., Computer Application, Sales & Marketing Management
AIMT Lucknow Courses.Eligibility Criteria: Graduate degree with minimum 50% marks in aggregate
